subdisciplines.name: Mechanical Design
subdisciplines.description: The application of engineering principles to the design of mechanical systems.

subdisciplines.name: Thermo-Fluids
subdisciplines.description: The study of thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer in mechanical systems.

subdisciplines.name: Manufacturing Engineering
subdisciplines.description: The application of engineering principles to the design and optimization of manufacturing processes and systems.

subdisciplines.name: Mechatronics
subdisciplines.description: The integration of mechanical, electrical, and computer engineering to design and control advanced systems.
